text: Pierre Aubert (3 March 1927 - 8 June 2016) was a Swiss politician, lawyer and former member of the Swiss Federal Council (1978–1987). He was elected to the Swiss Federal Council on 7 December 1977 as member of the Social Democratic Party from the canton of Neuchâtel. He handed over office on 31 December 1987. He was born in La Chaux-de-Fonds, Canton of Neuchâtel. Aubert died on 8 June 2016 in Neuchâtel, Switzerland at the age of 89. ==Other websites== Category:1927 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:People from La Chaux-de-Fonds
title: Pierre Aubert
